Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Greg Z:

Awesome food, service and atmosphere. Can't go wrong ordering at Red Drum. Will definitely return next time in Mt Pleasant area.

Review by - Yelp

Miles W:

This place is phenomenal. Got the potato flautas with bacon and cheese for an app. Had the pan seared sea scallops for dinner. Everything went so well together. Got a couple old fashioned drinks too. Everything was amazing and service was great.

Review by - Yelp

Frank C:

Great place for food and drinks. Bartenders attentive and personable. Either inside or the outside dining and bar area. Owners are hard working and very cool. And a must to check out their lunch truck.

Review by - Yelp

Ellie K:

Every time we visit Charleston this is a must go dinner. It's always great and tastes fantastic! I got the chicken for the first time and it was 10/10. Highly recommend!

Review by - Yelp

Jennifer W:

We absolutely love this place! The food and service is amazing. The chips and salsa...to die for.

[Page Title: THE RED DRUM GASTRO - Private Events]

Private Events

Red Drum offers a variety of private dining spaces that are perfect for your corporate events, rehearsal dinners, and other special celebrations. Our private spaces can accommodate groups of all sizes (up to 125 people). We offer select, customized seated dinner menus and group hors d’oeuvres/cocktail party menus at varying price points. Food and Beverage minimums apply to each private space, contracts are required to secure a private room reservation.

For special events or private dining, please contact Mary Catherine Chance at or call
thereddrumgastro@gmail.com 843-568-9571 Book Now a private event The Wine Room 
The Wine Room is inviting and warm. This is our most intimate private room. It is perfect for small celebrations and meetings. You will have a dedicated server and our team will explore menu options with you if you choose.

The Max Capacity for this room is 20 people.
See inside The Wine Room The Pub Room 
The Pub Room features a fireplace, wooden tables and a sliding barn door for privacy. This space can accommodate a set seated dinner or cocktail/hors d’oeuvres party. You can combine The Pub with our covered patio space for even larger events. Perfect for a rehearsal dinner or company holiday party.

The Max Capacity for this room is 50 people (125 if combined with our Patio).
See inside The Pub Room Outdoor Patio 
Our beautiful open air and covered patio features its own bar and heaters if needed. The Patio is ideal for larger parties looking to enjoy passed hors d’oeuvres and stations. Our event coordinator will work with you to create the perfect menu and evening.

The Max Capacity for this space is 70 people (125 if combined with our Pub Room).
